title: Quick question about clubs
body:
Dear community

I just wanna know why I don't have any tag names? I pinned the club that I want, re-installed league and stuff yet it still won't show my club tag. I'm in 3 different clubs and tried it with all of them but nothing works. It's been like this for months now.

Can anyone help me out?

replies.body:
um for a club tag make sure that there are 5 people in ur club for a club tag 
ur is new gen :D
We also have 5 people. In fact we have more. It still won't work
ask a riot employer for it maybe a bug or dunno...{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
How do you ask them? Sorry I don't really use community boards

Hey Dyosa,

The best way to contact riot is through their support page. It can take them several days to respond, and it'll probably just be an automated response at first, so keep that in mind. 

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us

Have you ticked the box "show club name" in the settings? I've attached an image for you. 

http://imgur.com/a/4iCdz 

Hope that helps!

Oh okay thanks
I haven't done that so I'll check it later when I get the chance to log in. Thanks for that and I'll let you know when if it solves the problem

Omg that fixed the problem!
Thanks so much

Glad to hear that fixed your problem Dyosa! :)

Now you can show everyone your awesome team tag- which guarantees you to win 392085% more games! Hehe
Ahahahahaha thank you so much xD
